rootCauses.title: Fix Root Causes
rootCauses.description: Address underlying issues rather than working around symptoms. Build proper infrastructure instead of creating technical debt.

simplicity.title: Elegant Simplicity
simplicity.description: The best code is simple, maintainable, and solves real problems. Complexity should only exist where it adds value.

performance.title: Performance First
performance.description: Optimize for speed at every layer. Sub-200ms response times, efficient bundling, and thoughtful resource management.

typeSafety.title: Type Safety

personal.title: Beyond the Code

meta.title: Projects - Charles Jackson | Full Stack Developer Portfolio
meta.description: Explore projects by Charles Jackson including Predictive (AI prediction platform) and MyUrbanFarm.ai (urban farming management). Case studies with technical deep-dives.

hero.title: Things I've
hero.subtitle: Deep dives into complex systems I've architected and built, showcasing technical decision-making and measurable outcomes. From AI platforms to sustainable agriculture tech.

predictive.subtitle: AI-Powered Prediction Platform
predictive.description: Enterprise-grade prediction intelligence platform that models complex interdependencies across 17 life domains. Features a 230-field user profiling system, hierarchical ontology with 1,000+ domain nodes, Monte Carlo simulations, and real-time analytics dashboard.
predictive.longDescription: Built entirely solo from architecture through deployment. The platform helps users make better decisions by analyzing patterns across multiple life domains using Bayesian inference and likelihood ratios.

dataModeling.title: Complex Data Modeling
dataModeling.description: Designed ontology-based architecture to represent relationships between 17 domains with weighted edges and inheritance patterns. Recursive CTEs for efficient tree traversal.

performance.title: Performance at Scale
performance.description: Achieved sub-200ms P95 latency through strategic denormalization, materialized views, and React Query caching. Code-split to 47KB initial bundle.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: Row Level Security policies for multi-tenant data isolation. Zero PII in client bundles. Encrypted at rest with automatic key rotation.

monorepo.title: Nx Monorepo Strategy
monorepo.description: Shared libraries for UI components, utilities, and TypeScript types. Incremental builds with computation caching reduce CI time by 60%.

database.title: PostgreSQL + Supabase
database.description: Real-time subscriptions for live updates. Automatic API generation with PostgREST. GIN indexes on JSONB columns for flexible schema evolution.

edge.title: Edge-First Deployment
edge.description: Vercel Edge Functions for API routes. Static assets on global CDN with immutable caching. Service worker for offline-first experience.

typeSafe.title: Type-Safe Full Stack
typeSafe.description: End-to-end type safety from database to UI. Generated types from PostgreSQL schema. Zod validation at API boundaries. Strict TypeScript.

urbanfarm.subtitle: Urban Farming Management Platform
urbanfarm.description: A comprehensive digital platform connecting urban farmers, corporate sponsors, and administrators to manage and monitor sustainable rooftop farming initiatives. Real-time tracking, analytics, and multi-stakeholder collaboration.
urbanfarm.longDescription: Enables stakeholders across the urban agriculture ecosystem to track crops, harvests, and growing conditions. Features role-based access for farmers, sponsors, and administrators with interactive mapping and performance analytics.

mapping.title: Interactive Mapping
mapping.description: Multi-site visualization with regional performance monitoring. Real-time location tracking and farm status overlays.

roles.title: Role-Based Access
roles.description: Differentiated permissions for urban farmers, client companies, chief urban farmers, and administrators. Secure multi-tenant architecture.

analytics.title: Analytics & Reporting
analytics.description: Performance insights, yield data, and resource utilization metrics. Stakeholder reports with KPI tracking and environmental impact documentation.

farmManagement.label: Farm Management
farmManagement.description: Comprehensive tracking for crops, harvests, and conditions

clientPortal.label: Client Portal
clientPortal.description: Real-time access for sponsors to view farm progress

multiSite.label: Multi-Site Support
multiSite.description: Manage multiple farm locations from one dashboard

world.subtitle: Browser Metaverse
world.description: A persistent browser-based 3D virtual world supporting 500 concurrent users with zero perceived lag and $0 hosting cost. WebGPU-first rendering optimized for Apple Silicon with GPU compute for terrain, particles, and vegetation.
world.longDescription: Multiplayer 3D world running entirely in the browser. Users connect, see each other, move around, and interact with objects in a persistent world. Everything runs on a single M4 Max with Cloudflare Tunnel for free public access.

networking.title: N² Networking
networking.description: Area of Interest filtering + frequency scaling + delta compression to reduce 267 MB/s theoretical egress to 10-20 KB/s per player.

zeroLag.title: Zero-Lag Architecture
zeroLag.description: Client-side prediction, optimistic updates, entity interpolation, and rollback with blend for seamless multiplayer experience.

gpuCompute.title: GPU Compute
gpuCompute.description: WebGPU compute shaders for terrain generation (marching cubes), 10M+ particles at 60fps, and L-system vegetation on GPU.

multiplayer.label: Multiplayer World
multiplayer.description: 500 concurrent users in shared persistent space

webgpu.label: WebGPU Rendering
webgpu.description: Native Metal 3 performance on Apple Silicon

selfHosted.label: Self-Hosted
selfHosted.description: Runs entirely on M4 Max via Cloudflare Tunnel

persistent.label: Persistent World
persistent.description: Supabase for auth, state, and realtime sync

features.title: Notable Components
features.subtitle: Deep dives into specific features and systems I've built

analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics Engine
analytics.description: High-performance analytics dashboard with WebSocket updates, optimized virtualization for large datasets, and smooth 60fps animations.

designSystem.title: Component Design System
designSystem.description: Comprehensive design system with 150+ components following atomic design principles. Full accessibility, theme support, and consistent spacing.

monteCarlo.title: Monte Carlo Simulation Engine
monteCarlo.description: Python-based prediction engine using Bayesian inference and likelihood ratios. Historical accuracy validation against real-world outcomes.

meta.description: Technical articles on software architecture, React, TypeScript, and building scalable systems. Insights from 20+ years of full-stack development.

hero.title: Thoughts on
hero.subtitle: Deep dives into architecture decisions, performance optimization, and lessons learned from two decades of shipping production code.

newsletter.title: More articles coming soon
newsletter.subtitle: I write about building production systems, architecture patterns, and lessons learned from shipping software. Follow along as I share more insights.

meta.title: Art & Creative Experiments - Charles Jackson
meta.description: Creative coding experiments with Three.js, WebGL, CSS animations, and interactive visual art. Exploring the intersection of code and creativity.

hero.title: Where Code Meets
hero.subtitle: Experiments at the intersection of programming and art. Three.js visualizations, generative graphics, CSS animations, and interactive experiences that push the boundaries of what's possible in the browser.

philosophy.title: Code as Canvas
philosophy.description: I believe code is a creative medium. These experiments explore visual aesthetics, motion, and interactivity - treating the browser as a canvas for artistic expression.

particleGalaxy.title: Particle Galaxy
particleGalaxy.description: Interactive 3D galaxy simulation with 100,000 particles. GPU-accelerated physics and custom shaders for realistic star formations.

fluidSimulation.title: Fluid Dynamics
fluidSimulation.description: Real-time fluid simulation using Navier-Stokes equations. Touch-reactive with beautiful color blending.

geometricPatterns.title: Geometric Patterns
geometricPatterns.description: Procedurally generated geometric art using recursive algorithms. Each refresh creates a unique composition.

morphingShapes.title: Morphing Shapes
morphingShapes.description: Pure CSS morphing animations with no JavaScript. Smooth shape transitions using CSS custom properties.

audioVisualizer.title: Audio Reactive
audioVisualizer.description: WebAudio-powered visualizer that responds to music in real-time. Frequency analysis drives particle behavior.

raymarching.title: Raymarched Worlds
raymarching.description: Procedural 3D scenes rendered entirely in fragment shaders. Signed distance functions create infinite detail.

techniques.title: Technologies & Methods
techniques.subtitle: The tools and approaches I use to bring creative visions to life.

webgl.title: WebGL & Shaders
webgl.description: Low-level GPU programming for maximum visual fidelity and performance. Custom GLSL shaders for unique effects.

threejs.title: Three.js
threejs.description: 3D graphics library for complex scenes, particle systems, and immersive experiences.

css.title: Advanced CSS
css.description: Pushing CSS to its limits with animations, gradients, filters, and creative use of pseudo-elements.

generative.title: Generative Art
generative.description: Algorithms that create unique variations. Noise functions, L-systems, and procedural generation.

cta.title: Want to Collaborate?
cta.subtitle: Always interested in creative collaborations, generative art commissions, or just geeking out about shaders and visual programming.

meta.title: Interests - Charles Jackson | Mathematical Modeling & Machine Learning
meta.description: Exploring the intersection of mathematics and software. Monte Carlo simulations, transformer architectures, deep neural networks, and natural language processing.

hero.title: Using Math to
hero.description: Fascinated by the power of mathematical modeling and machine learning to transform uncertainty into actionable insights. From Monte Carlo simulations to transformer architectures, I explore how mathematics can help us understand and predict complex systems.
hero.philosophy: Every prediction is a hypothesis, every simulation a test. The goal isn't perfect foresight—it's reducing uncertainty and making better decisions under incomplete information.

core.title: Areas of Focus
core.subtitle: The mathematical and computational techniques that drive modern prediction systems

monteCarlo.title: Monte Carlo Simulations
monteCarlo.description: Probabilistic modeling through repeated random sampling
monteCarlo.details: Running thousands of simulations to map probability distributions and quantify uncertainty. Essential for modeling complex systems where analytical solutions are intractable.

transformers.title: Transformer Models
transformers.details: Building and fine-tuning transformer-based models for sequence prediction, leveraging self-attention mechanisms to capture long-range dependencies in data.

deepLearning.title: Deep Neural Networks
deepLearning.description: Multi-layer architectures for learning complex patterns
deepLearning.details: Designing neural network architectures optimized for specific prediction tasks. From feedforward networks to recurrent architectures, choosing the right topology matters.

nlp.title: Natural Language Processing
nlp.description: Extracting structure and meaning from text
nlp.details: Processing and understanding human language to extract insights, from named entity recognition to semantic analysis and information extraction.

sentiment.title: Sentiment Analysis
sentiment.description: Quantifying opinion and emotion from text
sentiment.details: Analyzing text to determine sentiment polarity and emotional tone. Useful for understanding market sentiment, customer feedback, and public opinion.

bayesian.title: Bayesian Inference
bayesian.details: Using Bayes' theorem to update probability estimates as new data arrives. The mathematical foundation for learning from evidence and quantifying uncertainty.

why.title: Why Mathematics?
why.p1: Mathematics is the language of patterns. In a world drowning in data, mathematical models help us find signal in noise, structure in chaos, and insights in complexity.
why.p2: I'm drawn to problems where elegant mathematics meets messy reality. Monte Carlo methods let us explore vast possibility spaces. Bayesian inference helps us learn from evidence. Neural networks discover patterns too subtle for human perception.
why.p3: The goal isn't prediction for its own sake. It's about making better decisions under uncertainty—whether that's personal life choices, business strategy, or understanding complex systems.

research.title: Current Explorations
research.subtitle: Active areas of investigation and experimentation

prediction.title: Prediction Markets
prediction.description: How collective intelligence and market mechanisms can improve forecasting accuracy

ensemble.title: Ensemble Methods
ensemble.description: Combining multiple models to achieve better predictions than any single model

causal.title: Causal Inference
causal.description: Moving beyond correlation to understand cause-and-effect relationships

uncertainty.title: Uncertainty Quantification
uncertainty.description: Measuring and communicating confidence in predictions

application.title: Where Theory Meets Reality
application.subtitle: These interests aren't just academic—they're the foundation of what I build

predictive.title: Predictive Platform
predictive.description: All these techniques come together in Augure, an AI-powered prediction platform that helps people make better decisions about their future.
features: Monte Carlo simulations across 17 life domains
NLP for extracting structured data from questions

cta.title: Let's Talk Predictions
cta.subtitle: Interested in discussing mathematical modeling, machine learning, or prediction systems? I love geeking out about this stuff.
